## Description
AS A developer I WANT {skill or knowledge}, SO THAT {reason}

## Definition of ready (requirements in order to start)
- [ ] requirement1
- [ ] requirement2

## Definition of Done:
- All tasks are completed.

## Tasks:
- [ ] required task1
- [ ] required task2
